direction.raw_text: Cristina? She goes to Cristina's bed...atop the bed is a note. She picks it up. INSERT..THE NOTE Dear Flor,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . I decided to steal your daughter for a bit. LOVE, DEBORAH With great energy born of bottled fury, Flor begins to go through her daughter's things...finding her backpack and extracting a Spanish/English dictionary. INSERT DICTIONARY. As her finger points to: "Steal...robar" And then she flips some pages feverishly..Her finger indicating: "daughter .... hija" 98   EXT. PCH - EARLY AFTERNOON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop thanking me. I love having the company.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was an adventure which I'll remember.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your English is genius. Do you dream in Spanish or English?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just recently I've had a dream in English.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am so sorry. I -- uh..I'd ..I uh, can't tell ..This is so uncomfortable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You could have just said you didn't remember.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: uh, guess so..but I do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look who's sensational.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 99    EXT. CLASKY RENTED BEACH HOUSE - DAY.

direction.raw_text: Evelyn is sitting on the patio making sangria..Flor enters. She is pissed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong? She shows her the letter. Evelyn reads it and hands it back..She is about to offer something..Flor waves it off and enters the house..John comes in from the beach with his kids..boogie boards...Evelyn hands him the letter..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's wild-eyed over this.. John moves after Flor as Bernie reads the letter..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aw, shit.. (then quickly) Sorry about the word, Georgie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to know what happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No thank you. 100   INT. LIVING ROOM - DAY                                   100 John enters..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Flor.. She turns..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry..very sorry.. He indicates his watch -- then holds his fingers together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They should be back soon.. Flor starts to cry. She sits in a chair..He sits not far from her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Flor.. Embarrassed, she says, in Spanish, to please leave her alone..she turns from him..He walks to the wet bar and gets a bottle of water...pours some..Her crying soft in the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . background...He walks to her, sits near her and offers her the glass of water which she takes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deborah made a mistake. I understand how you feel...Do you understand me at all, generally? Is simpatico the word? He pats her on the back..She looks at him.. CLOSE ON FLOR.. Is he coming on?.. HER POV.. His kind eyes. FULL SHOT.. This is real eye contact..two vaguely humiliated people finding real company for an instant. Without thought, she duplicates his gesture and pats his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Simpatico, yes. And when he seeks to add another pat, he misses, because she is out of her chair..(This is as intimate as John has been with another woman since he was married..) He calls out to stop her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Un momento, huh? She stops and turns to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm really sorry this is happening. I just want you to know that. I am real sorry. He taps his heart as an indication of sincerity -- then a flash of worry that he has inadvertently come on to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't mean.. He makes a gesture of ardent love..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I meant.. Makes a person to person innocent gesture..She finds herself smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, the good thing about being an idiot is that every once in a while you cheer people up..Got to get to work. CAMERA STAYS WITH FLOR As he exits...thinks about John's demeanor, smiles again, shakes it off as her mind fills with concern for Cristina. 101   EXT. CLASKY RENTED BEACH HOUSE - SUNSET.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deborah's SUV loaded at the curb..She and Cristina begin to carry things in...(NOTE: Cristina's hair has been restyled.) 102   INT. CLASKY RENTED BEACH HOUSE - DAY                        102 Evelyn, Bernie and Flor are gathered in the living room. All staring at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Something bad happen? ON CRISTINA.. Enormously anxious on reading her mother's mood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cristina, tell your mother I just played around with your hair..she can put it back..no hurt feelings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not right now. Flor puts an arm around her shoulder, leading her off and speaking to her forcefully in Spanish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? -- EVELYN You can't just take someone else's.....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nuh-uh, Mom..don't go there..or I'll go there and you know where "there" is. Evelyn stops on a dime. She leaves. Deborah crosses to Bernice, who is highly concerned about Flor, and puts an arm around her. A pleasant surprise..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you believe what Flor is making this into..Shoot me if I ever get that hard to deal with. Bernice, unseen by Mom, does a long, muted, mock scream. 103   INT. FLOR'S ROOM - EVENING                                  103 MUSIC IN: Action, purpose, energy.. Flor is dictating in Spanish as Cristina writes it down in English on a pad. Cristina enormously uncomfortable. INSERT - THE PAD. The pad, in effect, lends subtitles to Flor's words. Cristina winces with the words she records even while punctuating perfectly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You cannot take my child without my permission..And, if you had asked me I would not have given permission. Is this why you did not ask? Because you knew this. You have no rights over my private life. ON FLOR.. Reaching a decisive conclusion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you have any disagreement with this, I no longer wish to work here. ON CRISTINA'S LOOK This is awful news. ON FLOR. For a decisive nod of affirmation. She adjusts her daughter's hair to the way it was, takes the note and exits. 104   INT. CLASKY RENTED BEACH HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - DAY          104 Flor enters in something of a fury and holds the letter out to Deborah, who hates being cornered in this manner. She actually places her hands behind her so as to avoid the note.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's this? Flor shakes the letter at her. OTHER ANGLE..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Showing Cristina hidden but looking on... like a stage prompter in the wings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From? Flor with enormous emphasis stabs her finger at her own chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are not yourself...This was written in anger. You sleep on it and then if you still want me to have it -- fine..I don't think you will once calm and rational thought returns. Just sleep on it. Deborah exits to a bathroom and closes the door...leaving Flor in the hall with the letter..Cristina reveals herself and explains the situation to her mother. The last word we hear before scene's end is "manana." 105   INT. CLASKY RENTED BEACH HOUSE - BEDROOM - MORNING         105 Deborah surreptitiously finishing putting on her running clothes and is making for the door when the alarm clock goes off and John awakens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She didn't even want us to know she had a daughter - then, on the first day, you take the kid without asking. I think that's...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What!?! Insensitive? Elitist? Irresponsible? Perverse? Dizzy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dumb. She looks at him...He has been atypical...Her immediate emotional cocktail is panic, fury and deep, deep hurt. Her words are slow...her voice ragged...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When is anyone in this damn house or this damn life going to consider my feelings? I just tried to make a lovely kid feel welcome. There's no reason to rake it over...I let it go..and gave Flor the room to let it go. Which I'm sure she has! It's over!! So get on board.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She opens the door and almost runs into Flor who is standing immediately in her way holding the letter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I slept. 106   INT. CLASKY BEACH RENTAL - DEN - DAY                     106 Deborah stands over Cristina, who is writing in Spanish a note Deborah is dictating. As John passes through the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am deeply and sincerely sorry to have upset you. Especially in light of the deep connection, as women, I believe us to have.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And to think I was worried about Flor living here with her kid? 107   EXT. CLASKY BEACH RENTAL - PATIO                         107 John is talking to all three kids in an effort to lift the overall atmosphere. IN THE BACKGROUND we see Deborah handing Flor her letter..Cristina taking sidelong glances...relieved to see them shake hands (Flor engaging), hug (Flor reluctant).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So here's the idea..I want to make a serving platter for serving fish using sea glass like this.. He holds out some sea glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I used to hunt for this stuff every free minute when I apprenticed in Italy. This is bits of broken glass that the ocean sand blasts over the years..great looking, huh? So you guys go hunting and I'll pay 50 cents for any piece, a dollar for anything as big as this and five dollars for any color that isn't brown, clear or green.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do we have to do this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, come on... Georgie and Bernice start off..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Cristina - go get em. Her eyes widen and off she runs, intoxicated with being included and having the chance to make money. 108   EXT. BEACH - DAY - VARIOUS SHOTS                            108 The kids combing through pebbles. Georgie becoming bored and stopping.. Bernie stopping. 109   EXT. BEACH - SAME SCENE - SUNSET..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lots of people on their decks..hot-tubbing, sunning, partying..rich people forming New Yorker cartoons in the background as Cristina continues to doggedly collect her sea glass. At one point, she comes upon a teenage couple making out near a mass of pebbles, and politely asks them to roll over so she can search the area. 110   INT. FLOR'S ROOM - PRE-DAWN                                 110 Cristina arising.. 111   EXT. BEACH - PRE-DAWN..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cristina collecting sea glass. 112   EXT. BEACH - SAME SCENE - NIGHT.

direction.raw_text: Illuminated by the surf lights of the beach homes, Cristina plugs away.

direction.raw_text: : 113   EXT. CLASKY'S RENTED BEACH HOUSE - LATE AFTERNOON.

dialogue.raw_text: As the truck leaves the tunnel and all is cliffs, sand, and waves..Cristina taking it in, unaware that her mother's eyes never leave her.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: John exits his door and steps to his car..as he is about to get in..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me. He looks up and steps around to where she is...there is a battered wood table along the side of the house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi..what's doing? She overturns a large bucket and a small mountain of sea glass spills on the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm broke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (feeling horrible) No..you don't have to pay..I'm sorry. Don't worry, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I'm kidding..Instead of a platter -- I'll just build a sea glass building and serve fish inside... Great, Cristina..Why don't you count it and..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have... Many times..I didn't sleep. I counted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what's the damage...total? Her eyes locked on his.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (dead serious) It depends on whether you consider these four a color other than green, brown or clear.. She takes them from her pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, this one is borderline.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I agree.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my God, you found a blue..Nobody finds a blue..You know how a blue happens? I mean, before the ocean blasts it for 30-40 years. Somebody had to throw away an old Milk of Magnesia bottle. You know what Milk of Magnesia is?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Unfortunately. He smiles broadly. The kid's a trip. He likes her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So how much for the whole deal?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (unable to look at him) Eleven hundred and one dollar. He reacts..then..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. We'll finish dealing with it when I get home from work. She gasps.. 114   INT. FLOR'S ROOM - ONE A.M.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flor asleep -- Cristina awake, alert..footsteps. She hears John enter. She moves slowly so as not to awaken Flor. 115   INT. HALLWAY - ONE A.M.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As she enters from the back room and sees that John is walking into the kitchen. Her eye goes to the hall table on which there sits a fat envelope with her name on it. 116   INT. CLASKY BEDROOM - ONE A.M.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: John enters the bedroom to find a note from Deb that she will be late. He is disappointed. 117   INT. FLOR'S ROOM - NIGHT - ON CRISTINA                     117 Not aware of being observed..opens the envelope and takes out a thick wad of cash..almost swoons..as she goes about hiding it..she is jolted by her mother's whispered incredulity...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cristina.. She turns...the wad of money in her hand.. 118   INT. POCKET KITCHEN - LATE NIGHT                           118 The best chef in America has just fixed himself a snack as a salve to his spirits. It's a little like Dagwood Bumstead as a culinary genius..This is a snack we will remember and copy...John is approaching a perfect moment...and this is a guy who appreciates simple pleasures to the fullest... 119   INT. CLASKY HOUSE - LIVING ROOM                            119 He carries the brilliant snack to the living room and is just about to take his first bite when he hears emotional Spanish voices approaching. He looks up. ANGLE ON FLOR AND CRISTINA As they enter. Cristina translating her mother's words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My mother wishes me to represent exactly what she says, nothing else.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . And so, for the remainder of the scene, Flor will speak in Spanish and Cristina will not only translate but render her mother's emotion, sometimes including body language. It is not only a translation but a reenactment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I talk to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean your mother.... Cristina nods...not comfortable breaking the rule of only speaking for her mother...She faces him, her back to Flor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looking at Flor) Sure you can talk to me.. Cristina begins translating as her mother speaks in Spanish..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have to sleep first?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong? Flor waves the money..Cristina waves an empty hand as she speaks for her mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you give this money to my daughter?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I made this little deal..with all the kids to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (interrupting) Please.. Flor advances on him past her daughter so Cristina now translates from the background.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't tell or ask the mother when you give a child a fortune for looking on the beach for stones..what is the word for this..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sea glass? On hearing the translation of "sea glass" an exasperated Flor turns so that her back is to John as Cristina admonishes him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No..not a name for the stones..a name for the act..what you did.. ON FLOR.. As she spits out the word to her daughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: EngreIdo. ON JOHN.. As his eyes shift to Cristina fearing the word he will hear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no..engreIdo's going to be rough. ON CRISTINA.. Reluctantly taking the emotional stance of her mother to deliver the word.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (briefly being herself) It's hard to translate. She takes half a beat..finds the word and now spits it out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smug. John gets up and takes a conciliatory step toward Flor so that now Cristina is in the middle looking up at them as she translates for John
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had no idea it would amount to that kind of money..I thought --- sort of tops fifty dollars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fifty dollars is a lot of money..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Right. He has no idea where to take it from here -- the two females look as he searches for the right thing to say..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sighing to himself) Ah, shit.. That fast Cristina translates.. Before Flor can react. John talks directly to Flor..quiet,compassionate, a bit beaten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry....I get why you are upset. It might not look it but I am good at getting things. Doing something about it is something else..I was going to talk to you before I actually gave her the money..but maybe I should have checked before I started the whole thing. (he smiles/they don't) I know what it's like when you feel your kid is being messed with..I get the message. It won't happen again. It's late..I'm sure we'd all like... Flor lets it out...her daughter hard pressed to keep up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To what..sleep? If this was small enough to be helped by some little apology, I would be a fool to bring it up..I need to say more no matter what the result. I need to be impolite. You leave someone else's child alone. It's simple, no? It is too easy for children to feel contradictions..It encourages questioning their parents..and that makes them less safe. Your wife takes her for rides and changes her hair..You give her money. Here.. (this next sentence Cristina translates with alarm and adds her own question mark.) Take back the money???????????? Flor hands John the envelope under her daughter's wrenching gaze. They begin to exit..but Flor turns inadvertently bumping into her daughter. Her voice softens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did not mean to be angry to you - only emotional.. They turn to leave. John speaks with sudden volume and muscle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about hypocritical? Cristina turns back..confused..her mother asks her for a translation and she complies.. Flor then wearing the same confused expression.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, you heard me. It's not like you didn't do the same thing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (hard on the translation) No!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes. So go lecture yourself..you won't need a translator for that one...I mean what am I lately... A recycling bin?..just anyone dump in your garbage and hope I make something useful out of it... Flor is confused and getting pissed but he is moving now and pointing a finger at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, you did the same thing...you think I didn't know about altering those outfits for Bernie..She tells me her stuff....So, am I missing something? Is there a real difference between that and what you are complaining about? Cristina waits for a comeback from her mother to translate..but doesn't get one..Instead her mother is a bit mortified and considerably humbled..the pie smack into the face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sin diferencia. Yo interferI.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No difference. I interfered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay......I'm still not sure I did the right thing keeping it to myself. It felt disloyal to Deborah..but my daughter really needed someone to be kind to her right then..so..so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am very embarrassed. You are very right. Hypocrisy..yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (something strikes him, he softens, disoriented) I'll tell you, it's pretty wild to say something and have the other person just concede the point. I'm dazed here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will leave whenever it is good for you and...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No..no..come on, man..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But how can I work for you after we talk like this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't quit even if you want to and you know why.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, you do.. Flor is worried as John looks right at her..Is he coming on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because then Cristina will blame herself for costing you the job...and that guilt...I don't know if you know about guilt.. Cristina doesn't have to check with her mother on this one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Culpa, guilt, sI. We know. We are Catholics.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (after her daughter's translation) Culpa, si..Por Dios, Si.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (on her own) We know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (big nod) We know. John gestures that there is nothing to be done. Flor nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, welcome back. She smiles..gets up..extends her hand..they shake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good night, Mr. Clasky..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good night As they exit..their backs to John, daughter following mother...Flor speaks to her daughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No te puedo tener haciendo esto por mi. Ahora tengo que aprender inglEs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't have you doing this for me. I must learn English now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, dije eso por ti - no por John. That translates to "No, I meant that for you, not John." But Cristina does not translate the line. Nor..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have a wonderful mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Que?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nada. 120   INT. FLOR'S ROOM - NIGHT                                 120 A Spanish commercial for learning English in a hurry is on television..Flor on the phone ordering it..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Learning English would cost five hundred and ninety nine dollars down and 15 monthly payments of one hundred and ten dollars...which represents 48 percent interest..Mexicans marketing Mexicans. But not a penny was wasted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 121   EXT. MAIL BOX - DAY                                        121 As Flor takes a package from the box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My mother showed an extraordinary facility for learning the language.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 122   INT. BEACH HOUSE - LAUNDRY ROOM - DAY                      122 Flor listening to the tapes as she does laundry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ..as well as a totally committed, obsessive work ethic, which blocked out all else..She was her daughter's mother. As Flor silently mouths some English while listening to a tape,Chum nudges her with a ball and, without thinking, she takes it from his mouth and tosses it..Realizing, with alarm, a beat too late that she has broken the rule.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 123   EXT. BEACH - LATE AT NIGHT                                 123 Flor sitting on the sand...listening to her tapes..continually forced by Chum's obsessive persistence to throw him the ball. DISSOLVE TO: 124   EXT. BEACH HOUSE - LATE NIGHT                              124 As John arrives...He bumps the walls on entering. 125   INT. BEACH HOUSE - LATE NIGHT                              125 As John enters the house, clearly drunk.   There is the sound of skittering paws as CHUM approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, boy, I can use some up company. But Chum feverishly digs his snout against a nearby piece of furniture and retrieves a tennis ball and rockets away. John follows, weaving a bit. 126   INT. BEACH HOUSE - DEN - LATE NIGHT                        126 As John enters the room to find CHUM proffering the ball to Flor who is watching one of video language tapes. She tosses the ball without a look or a thought..then starts when she sees John standing there. He cheers, seeing her predicament.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . When she speaks English, at this point, her words are halting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You gotta do something about Chum..Your arm's going to go. She waves it off and hurries to get her tape and get out of his way. Chum complicates the task, proffering the ball. Flor wearily throws it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you sleep anymore?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No..You get more if you keep at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're doing fantastic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now I am like a three year-old. Your wife go out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She say where?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. (on his reaction) Sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen..I just forgot she was going out..don't be a smart ass. (jolted by his own remark) Uh-oh..well, you and I communicate mostly in apologies anyway..I'm sorry. I should be whipped. I should be stoned- it's been a while - I meant to say, I think, don't be smart, don't be kind, don't be sensitive, don't be beautiful. I meant to say, "hi, Flor, good night Flor..that show you're watching is going to be a hit." He staggers out. Flor watches his lonely back for a beat and then urgently gestures Chum to join him. Chum is reluctant, but relenting, runs and accompanies his appreciative master. Flor, now alone, finds herself staring at a framed picture of John in the den. He is younger and smiling. She studies the picture and then blinks when she realizes her own emotion and purposefully goes back to her lessons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 127   EXT. P.C.H. - LA SALSA FAST FOOD PLACE - DAY.

dialogue.raw_text: (over her shoulder to John as they move)
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Cristina and Bernice waiting in line at the Mexican fast food place on P.C.H. with the towering signature Mexican male figure on its roof. Deborah is parked curbside in the SUV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How'd you get your mother to let you go with my mother?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, your mother just said she could use my help on a few errands while you're in class... Bernice nods. Then unconsciously moans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Just that I hate summer school.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you go then?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure I can explain to you the concept of not doing well in a class..in this case math...and the system kind of insists on the illusion that you've learned math -- so they make you go to summer school..It helps them avoid facing that they have failed in their mission.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean they failed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Joking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. I see. Forgive me, I don't have a real sense of humor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, God. (on Cristina's reaction) Joking...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The joke is?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . As they get in the car..Bernice doing a little stutter step offering Cristina the front seat..Cristina demurs. 128   INT. SUV - DAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As they get in..Deborah privy to the conversation now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That you're better at everything than I am...and I was thanking God for there being this one thing where I might have my nose in front. Deborah can't think of what single thing Bernice could possibly feel superior about. She is genuinely puzzled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that thing is??? Bernice deeply resents the question..She turns to her mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sexual experience.. Cristina laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That one even she knows is funny. Cristina gives Bernice an appreciative push from behind. Deborah, for some reason, feels she deserves credit for their connection.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at you girls. 129   INT. BEACH BEDROOM - DAY                                   129 Deb working an outfit..her mother eyeing her..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cristina's already read, on her own, everything on Bernice's summer reading list..And she's two grades behind..Imagine if she went to Bernice's school..And they'd kill to give her a scholarship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Talk to Flor...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah..she's so open to new things.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 130   EXT. GORGEOUS PRIVATE SCHOOL -DAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deborah and Cristina standing in a grass bordered parking lot...Deborah, feigning upset, tearing into her bag but her focus is elsewhere as she periodically looks off. She is clearly stalling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can't find my keys.. Another woman, ARLENE FOLSOM, calls to her..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deborah...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Arlene.. (to Cristina) Come on. They walk to greet Arlene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi. This is Cristina..the girl I'm always raving about..This is Arlene Folsom..the school director.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello..a pleasure to meet you, Ms. Folsom. I couldn't believe how beautiful the grounds were as we drove in. I just think the balance of the buildings to open ground is so wonderful and must have been very difficult to achieve. Deborah smiles with pride at the elegant first impression Cristina is making..all are grinning...the two adults suspiciously so...sharing their delight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you like a little tour? MOVING CAMERA.. First showing Cristina in foreground and her POV of this Drop Dead Gorgeous Rich Kids School in the background and then we MOVE CLOSER ON CRISTINA. We see lust in her reaction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The experience was literally mind boggling. My mind did boggle. My cranial cells stunned. Even if I had enough sense of wonder to imagine such a school existed; my sense of fairness made it unthinkable that any school could offer this much more than my own.. 131   INT. BEACH LIVING ROOM - DAY                             131 This is the last day of the summer rental - many packed cartons on the floor. Deborah, Flor and Cristina engaged in a momentous conversation..(NOTE: Throughout the following, and quite beside the point, we see Flor periodically make the motion of throwing the ball. But we do not cut to Chum, rather we just hear his claws skittering after the ball as we maintain focus on the momentous conversation.)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nuh-uh, Flor you are not pinning this one on me. I've got to finish packing up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just don't....Out of space this school wants her to go for free?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We ran into the school head. They want diversity...Cristina knocked her out...I had nothing to do with it. By the way, the scholarship is worth twenty thousand dollars. And early registration is tomorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is too far from our home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You could move in with us in town.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never, thank you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, then don't..By the way..the phrase is "NO, thank you." 132   INT. FLOR'S ROOM - NIGHT                                 132 Flor has her earphones on listening to her English tapes..but she is enormously upset as she watches her daughter passionately pray in English..soon taking off the ear phones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, dear God..Enter my mother's heart and make her understand what this school would mean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright. I look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Amen. 133   EXT. L.A. PUBLIC SCHOOL - FLOR AT CRISTINA'S SCHOOL - DAY 133 Summer session - L.A. public school..ninety percent Hispanic. Through Flor's POV, the place is seen not as crowded and worn but as vibrant with community. 134   EXT. PRIVATE SCHOOL - FLOR AT BERNICE'S SCHOOL - DAY     134 Highly anxious and out of place, she sees the upper-scale students..five percent Latino...No brochure can do it justice. Overwhelmed by the implications, Flor's eyes tear. 135   INT. FLOR'S ROOM - LATE NIGHT                            135 Cristina sleeps. Flor sits on her bed - no thought of sleep. 136   INT. BEACH HOUSE - LATE NIGHT                            136 John enters, home from work ... as he passes Flor's door it opens and she steps out. Before she can continue on, she sees Evelyn at the foot of the stairs, carrying a glass of port.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Flor, want some port?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, thank you, Evelyn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks for never judging me..Love you. Love everybody. That's what's killing me.. Sleep well. EVELYN'S POV. She sees Flor approach John. Evelyn looks thoughtful. 137   INT. DEN - LATE NIGHT                                    137 John is about to pour himself a stiff drink. Flor startles him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I talk with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me? (she nods) Deborah will be home soon. I just talked to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need real talk..Is it okay? John does not answer immediately. The brief pause is noted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Outside? Private?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure..... (as they exit to beach with a nervous laugh) You have me a little worried... He glances back, hoping to have his fears assuaged, they are not. 138   EXT. BEACH - NIGHT                                       138 He sits..she stands, gorgeous..The wind gusts periodically blowing her dress against her body. He tries not to notice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know about Cristina and your great school?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, it's happened. Is it driving you nuts?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, nuts. I have no idea what to do. Such an important thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a good school?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tops. It's tops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you like it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I hate the damn school. But that's because they keep sending my daughter home anxiety-ridden, mostly over geometry..I mean you "get" Bernice..In a decent world her school should let her know how great she is, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, don't ask me..I'm worried about my own kid there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have to worry about Bernice. Nothing is going to change that heart. He looks at her..Out of nowhere overwhelmed by someone echoing and affirming his deepest most private thoughts about his daughter..It is odd..being this deeply touched before he knows what hit him..He makes little adjustments until the moment passes..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um.....yeah..thanks... (then) It's great to hear someone else say that out loud..Hard to explain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "get" it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a beat..then deeply, with core feelings, a lament) Ah, man..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (caring) It will be okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I was thinking about you..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (instantly alarmed) Your, "Ah, man" was for me? You think I am in trouble with Cristina?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's just tough to be sane. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To know you're not just making something out of nothing. That when you think you're at some crossroads - you are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (she takes this in/nods) ....I never know a man who can put himself in my place like you do. How do you become that man?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know...You introduce two Jews in the desert and wait five thousand years. Then, bingo, somebody else who can see trouble coming but can't do anything about it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. I don't know what I'm talking about.. A sustained gust of wind which celebrates her shape in a way which cannot be ignored.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will you sit down.. Get out of the damn wind. She sits. It helps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you going to send her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. But it does not feel good. I think if she goes there it will be one of two things..either she will be odd...or she will make herself the same as them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in wonderment) That is EXACTLY the way I felt about Bernice going there..Exactly. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wasn't able to think it that clearly...But that's how I felt. So between odd and the same...you gotta root for odd, don't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, you gotta. Camera begins to pull back...early in the move John's words stop the movement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This was a crummy summer. Flor nods ruefully..then suddenly off a glance at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not all crummy. Suddenly there is a bit of danger..she rises quickly, changing mode.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, good night. I go sleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good night..Hey? She turns..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You speaking English...It's, uh..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. Just.... Nice meeting you. She gulps and exits...as the CAMERA PULLS BACK..ending the summer at the rented house...as we transition to.... 139   EXT. BIG BLUE BUS IN MOTION - MORNING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Through the unusual center window we see Flor and Cristina. Flor, at this moment, is assimilating against every fiber in her body. Cristina is excited, certain her life is taking an incandescent turn. Quite a contrast. 140   EXT. STONE CANYON AND SUNSET - MORNING                    140 As the bus stops...Bernice is across the street, along with some other kids and Deborah, who is wearing her running clothes..Flor and Cristina exit the bus...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (calling) You just made it...I was getting worried.. Deborah has a backpack loaded with books which she hands to Cristina..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I picked up your books yesterday.. (by way of explanation to Flor) This is one of Bernie's old..ancient backpacks. Cristina taking it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, thank you.. As she shoulders it and almost falls over..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (impressed with the heft) This is a great school.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Cristina) I got you a little first-day-at-a- new-school present... A school bus appears and heads toward them putting a certain deadline pressure on the transaction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's from me and....Bernice. (to Flor) Okay? It is a big day. Flor's uncertain reaction is taken as a yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (dry) What did we get her? Deborah hands Cristina a locket..then, noting Flor's expression.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Cristina) It's from ALL of us. Your mother too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Cristina) It's not from me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Deborah does a good-natured "TAKE" accepting Flor's reaction as if it where an eccentricity..As Cristina and Bernice board the bus, Cristina generally says goodbye to both women, thereby depriving Flor of her own moment of passage with her daughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have a great year, girls.. (for Flor) This is so great. It fills your heart, doesn't it? Deborah turns and sees Flor has already started doggedly up the hill.. 141   EXT. STREET - HILL - ANGLE ON FLOR...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Walking up the hill, blinking in disbelief at her own fury..Deborah in the background feeling a bit abandoned..Flor keeps walking toward the camera..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is a terrible crisis which comes when your own personality is not equal to the challenge you face. When being who you are no longer works. Deborah has started to jog. As she approaches Flor, she calls for a clear path well in advance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Left...left. Flor does not alter course though she does start to walk faster...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Left...left... Deborah is close behind now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: LEFT! Suddenly, Flor breaks into a run..She is lithe and quick. ON DEBORAH... A blink of confusion...then something resembling innate satisfaction as she quickens her gait and...the Race is on. ANGLE AS DEBORAH DRAWS ABREAST OF FLOR. Strangely, she is interpreting this as closeness. She is genuinely warm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why am I not surprised you're competitive? Deborah looks up the street at a delivery truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, they're delivering my table. Flor stays on task ..forces her stride. She just needs to win so very much..that's all..to her current surprise, that's everything...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are fast.. Better pace yourself though.. Flor, even more upset and provoked by the words now lets it all out... ON DEBORAH.. Realizing she may not be a certain winner...she is concerned as she goes after the rabbit. OTHER ANGLE. Showing the delivery truck as finish line in the distance... VARIOUS SHOTS.. Flor fueled by desperation. Deborah, relentlessly gaining, exhilarated. THE FINISH.. Decidedly anti-climactic..Deborah draws even -- passes her-- arrives at the house with a large margin of victory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you for trying. 142   EXT. CLASKY HOUSE - DAY                                  142 She exits into her home. ON FLOR.. Bent over, hands on knees, sweaty, gasping for breath. Flor finally straightens up and, there being no other course, continues her walk up the hill, to work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When people exist under one roof, a tiny society forms..the stuff of (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: novelas: masters and servants unconsciously dancing in lock step so that, when things go wrong, traumas converge. 143   INT. CLASKY HOME - NIGHT...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As John moves past Evelyn on his way to work. She looks at him a little wild-eyed as they both stand in the doorway. Straining a bit for breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You feel okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I've given up drinking. (he looks at her/she sadly nods affirmation) I had to do it John..I need every brain cell to watch out for all of us..given the current climate. Anyway. John, I think you're great and I'm going to act accordingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good deal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's hope. 144   INT. FLOR'S APT. - LATE AFTERNOON                        144 Flor cooking alongside Monica --- a table is set for ten..A banner proclaiming BIENVENIDA, MAMA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My great Aunt Monica had finally managed to get her mother to Los Angeles and my mother was making a party. 145   INT./EXT. DEBORAH'S CAR / CLASKY HOME - DAY              145 Bernice sitting amidst Cristina and two other golden girls as they arrive at the Clasky home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was with my friends who had helped me understand real optimism. As they pull in the driveway. Cristina and her friends exit the car and squeal loudly at each other with the excitement of having it all. Bernice exits last. She is not squealing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 146   INT. CLASKY HOUSE - NIGHT                                146 As Deb finishes dialing a call..Cristina looking on...her two friends watching a movie in the family room. A clock prominently reads nine p.m.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flor? Deb..Look, sorry to call you so late, but they're still studying and I'm going out but I promised to get her back so if you want me to cut off the school work, fine...whatever you want me to do. Well, okay..you think about it.. (she holds on to give Flor time) And hey, if you're tired, or want to play, let her sleep here and I'll get her back there tomorrow. You still want to think about it? Okay.. She hangs up...and exchanges a mischievous look with Cristina. 147   INT. FLOR'S APT. - NIGHT                                 147 As Flor hangs up..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Though it is possible to judge harshly my conduct toward my mother in my first year at school; almost all professional literature excuses my behavior as developmental, since I was entering an age where rebellion and narcissism were to be expected. And I was being mentored. Monica and her newly arrived mother are there along with the bride from an earlier scene and some of the girls who saw Cristina off to Malibu..Women cooking in the kitchen..She tells the girls, in Spanish, that Cristina may not make it. They are disappointed...Flor thinks - then says something to Monica who nods in agreement. Flor exits. 148   EXT./INT. CLASKY FRONT DRIVEWAY..NIGHT
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Evelyn stands there...a little in the shadows.. HER POV... Deborah somewhat dolled up moving through the interior of the house..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 149   EXT. CLASKY DRIVEWAY - NIGHT...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Deborah leaves the house in a hurry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! Deborah turns, startled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to talk to you privately, honey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Honey?"-- Can't now, Mom...I'm late..I was looking all over for you...keep an eye on the kids. You know my secret cell number.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just give me a moment to talk here..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it? Are you buzzed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I gave up drinking weeks ago. (on Deborah's reaction) Yes. Nobody noticed -- which shows I probably conducted myself pretty well as a drunk. But duty called and I'm sober so may I say just one thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One thing..go ahead...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks..Deborah, you're going to lose your husband and you'll never find someone as good. There will only be men who you know are cheap and shallow and have no real warmth in their souls. You may have gotten by on those surfaces once but now you've been spoiled by a good man and you can no longer glide on such thin ice. If you do not act quickly you will soon cement an awful fate for yourself. A life, with no hope of repair, which has already begun to turn desperate and dumb. That's it. Drive safely. She grabs a deep breath and then turns and walks to the house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we're out of coffee, it's over for me. Suddenly a sharp horn is heard..Evelyn jumps..then turns to see her daughter calling to her from the driver's seat of the SUV..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've done it again, Mom, made me hate myself..One of the things I can count on..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Honey, lately your low self-esteem is just good common sense. Deborah considers that last thought for a long beat before she drives off..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 150   EXT. STONE CANYON - LATE NIGHT...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flor walking from the beginning of the hill........She looks off to see John's vehicle approaching..She brightens.. ON JOHN.. Who doesn't see her..We can see his car's digital clock reading 11:30. ON FLOR.. As he drives past her. 151   INT. CLASKY HOME - NIGHT...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As John enters..Evelyn, in an adjoining room, moves to intercept him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: John, better wait a minute. But John hears Deb's crying from upstairs..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell's wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. In all futility, can I urge you not to go up there. But he is already moving quickly up the stairs..As he turns at the top of the stairs WE SEE THE DOOR CLOSE TO BERNICE'S ROOM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ON EVELYN..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Denouement. 152   INT. MASTER BEDROOM - NIGHT...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: John enters the room on the double...passes Deborah without knowing it..(she is partially obscured by the drape or some such). As he passes....camera HOLDS ON DEBORAH..she is a mess...goopy tear stains..seeing him and his concern brings her grief to a higher ground...a sinner humbled by goodness..a trembling lip of childlike vulnerability...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deb..Deb?..where are you? He is about to leave the room...she is about to let him but an instinct leads her astray once more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here I am.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Baby, what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Baby?" Stay there, John...Sit down..I suddenly get what I have to do...I just have to get the guts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it absolutely necessary to make it this...this scary..can you just say it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not so easy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah..come on..it's me. We can talk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do I ever hope so...I've been seeing another man for the last eleven weeks and it was nothing and I ended it tonight..At first it was just keeping an eye on the real estate market..Then it was...what? Me being insecure and looking for some ridiculous vali... ON JOHN...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A shock victim..he holds up a hand to stop her..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go -- hold on...hold on...I'm missing what you're saying..You can't just keep talking and expect me to follow it when you start the way you did.......
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just what did you hear?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well there was the crack in the planet. That was noisy... She looks at him...a solid beat...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's an actual noise in my head.....no kidding.. Briefly he does the noise...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (slowly) I met him about... John holds up a hand to stop her...he needs to gather himself to hear this..She waits...and waits...as he waits he grows flushed and stunned with dread. Finally a word..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You.. She takes that as a cue to start..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I met him.. He puts up his hand..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you talk that fast...I'll never hear you..there's a lot going through my mind....Have you said yet whether you slept with him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So far I've just been talking about a flirtation because the really important thing for you to know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you said yet whether you've had sex with someone else? Because I really am missing most of your words. So help me out here..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been trying to explain that for the first ten weeks there was almost nothing to ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sincerely checking but wild) You still haven't said, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is this your way of...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is my way of...this is my way of asking you whether.. He stops... staggering on the threshold of a diminished future.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh man, once I ask it...give me a second. (several beats then some conversational good manners for keeping her waiting) I'm just trying to figure out whether there's any way to avoid knowing..no, damn (quickly closing this argument with himself) There's not... (to her) Okay, you're on..real short answer, huh? Have you had sex with another..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know you're very angry?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (considering/then repressed answer) Ahhhh...I'm getting there, yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softly) John? (on his look) I think if you let me tell you the full everything of this we'd be in a position to deal with it better..because eleven weeks ago when...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't believe that I miss your words..I get three or four tops...and then just see your mouth moving with nothing coming out and then I spin out and there's this noise...But there's no way to miss a "yes" or "no."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I made up my mind that I would answer every question you had..I'll answer anything and everything and more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What other questions could there be?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you really that much nicer than me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you don't set the bar real high. He get up and starts to exit..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Please, please, please..I think if you listen to exactly what happened and then do whatever you need to...we'll..just let me tell you everything.. The doorbell rings...it's quite late...Deborah wondering what's up..she looks out the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, it's just Flor. 153   EXT. STONE CANYON NIGHT..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Flor enters the Clasky House...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 154   INT. CLASKY HOUSE - LATE NIGHT                             154 Flor sees Evelyn in the living room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want Cristina. I want to talk to Mrs. Clasky. I want to quit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think you can do any of it right this minute..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes..Where's Cristina? 155   INT. MASTER BEDROOM - NIGHT                                155 Deborah can barely look at him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...then, when I was driving back tonight after I ended the whole yuck thing..I was feeling human. I'm done with what's his name..a relief... ..and now it can be like it never happened and then I thought that the only hope was that I own that it did happen and that I take my medicine here..because if I'm walking around with what I did and you don't know what I did..there is a real limit to how close we can be..you're with me and I'm this person who has this bad secret and we aren't really on the same page ever again..so the reason I took this chance in telling -- is because I want us to be good..I want us to be close. I want to feel like you're not nuts to be in love with me..So what I think is we should talk till we pass out .. Talk till we're so sick of each other that there's nothing left to do but take the first step out of hell..So please let's not leave this room until you've heard and said everything..please say, okay.. She awaits his answer..He has heard barely a few words..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: John..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got to get out of here..because you keep talking. (as she starts to follow him) Stay put! She does. Just before he exits.

direction.raw_text: Evelyn, Bernice and Georgie are in the pool..Cristina, wearing a bathing suit, is on a chaise reading...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, mom...Is it okay if we don't leave right away? The others call greetings..save Evelyn who studies the situation and gets out of the pool..Flor is awkward..no idea how to handle this...so she goes direct.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... (as Cristina begins to protest) No..and we must say "goodbye." I don't work here anymore. She then talks Spanish to Cristina..admonishing her not to embarrass them..something about Flor being prepared to go nuts all over her daughter if she hurts their dignity...but it is said with total calm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do I have to get out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Georgie..Stay. I think you are a wonderful boy..be good..like you are. There are no monsters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks..thanks. Okay. Bernice climbs out of the pool. Meanwhile, a flabbergasted Cristina is staring at her mom who gives quiet two and three word proddings in Spanish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (severely to Georgie) I can't believe you didn't get out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flor said.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Flor) I don't want to get you wet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get me wet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (rushing to hug her) Thanks. Bernice hugs her. Evelyn hugs Cristina..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You...are...a...trip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Bernice) You're a beauty. Amazing girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Despite herself, Bernice starts to cry..moans to herself over the display...Now, in the background, we hear a subliminal human voice. Incrementally it will grow louder and be recognizable as Deborah calling Flor from the master bedroom window..Bit by bit, the others will become aware of this as Flor ignores it...Bernice goes to embrace Cristina.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My last chance to have some of you rub off on me.. (Cristina doesn't understand) I'm sorry you're so sad but this could have been so much worse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How? And now Deborah calling "Flor" is getting hard to ignore but Flor manages..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you run upstairs and say goodbye to Deborah? Flor flashes a look of thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be in front. Upset, Cristina runs off. She kisses Bernice..and walks toward the house. As she passes under the bedroom..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please come see me. And then a crying Cristina appears on the deck. Flor glances up and keeps moving underneath the deck where she faintly hears the beginning of their exchange
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay, honey..we'll see each other at school..I'm going to keep an eye on you..I will. Flor enters the house... 181   INT. KITCHEN - DAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She stands waiting..walks to the hallway and cranes her head to see into rooms, wondering if John is there. Finally, as she passes the stairwell, she sees Cristina on an upper landing and says, in Spanish, that Cristina should get her things and meet her out front. Cristina, agitated, moves off to comply...then Deborah appears in the same spot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please stick your head in here for a minute. Flor nods and starts up the stairs... 182   INT. MASTER BEDROOM - DAY                                   182 Deborah holds open the door while Flor walks inside..then closes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's with avoiding me, am I this horrible person? As Flor just looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. It's a ridiculous question but sometimes I'm ridi...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. It's a good question. A fine question. Complicated. (beat then) I was just thinking to answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh stop.   Come on. Weren't we close?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'm very, very disappointed to hear that. It makes me feel like a fool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We weren't close..but we were connected...in a bad way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know something, I think we're saying the same thing...Look as long as we're doing closure..What did you and my husband, John, do last night? Flor pauses for less of a beat than we would have imagined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can only tell you what I did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That will be sufficient.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I became sure of what an incredibly lucky woman you are and I must make myself not envy you which is hard. No, it's not hard. It's impossible. Now please..I am exhausted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Same here - believe me. Deborah would hug..but it's only an eighth of a gesture because Flor has turned to exit, calling for her daughter to hurry as she goes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cristina, apurate. 183   EXT. CLASKY HOUSE - DAY                                    183 As she exits the house and moves to the gate where she punches in the exit code... ANGLE ON GATE As it swings open to reveal John... 184   EXT. STREET - DAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As she moves alongside him and the gate closes behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was hanging out here waiting. Can't give you guys a lift? Flor shakes her head "no." She looks away for a beat so the next thing she does is a considered action. She leans forward and kisses him on the lips. John looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is killer. (on her confusion) Incredibly hard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Cari.. The gate opens and a sniffling Cristina is holding an armful of loot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let her have it..party favors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She nods..bites back some emotion and turns from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cristina..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodbye, Mr. Clasky..I am very sorry we will not see each other as frequently. She offers her hand, which John shakes while patting her on the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. They turn and begin walking down the street. SHOT - STONE CANYON The women walking toward camera, John briefly in the background...As they begin their walk Flor begins talking in Spanish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The first minute we were alone, my mother told me that I would no longer go to the private school.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. No..You can't. I won't be able to forgive you..It will be the end. I won't let you. And then Cristina moves her hysterics to Spanish as she stops walking and her mother takes her hand and pulls her along with enormous dedication. CAMERA BEGINS A PULL BACK. Cristina dropping presents..picking them up..one of them left by the wayside..People noticing..Cristina's conduct violating tacit zoning laws. CLOSER SHOT.. So we can see their faces in the struggle. 185   EXT. BUS STOP..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As they wait...Flor talks sharply to Cristina to control herself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My mother changed our lives once more. This time because she saw in me, to her great alarm, a character flaw of some size. She has taught me to be a watch dog of my character, to control my ambition. I am not quite there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . One last yelp from Cristina as the bus arrives. 186   INT. BUS - DAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Almost empty - it's Saturday. Mother and daughter sit together by the giant window in the center of the bus. Cristina eyes her mother who is bearing her own heartbreak with stoic dignity. The girl is becoming less inconsolable and more in need of mothering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For that reason should you choose to grant me your scholarship my mother, at my request, will be relocating to the New York Metropolitan Area so that she can stay close during my time at Princeton. Cristina moves closer to Flor, who senses it immediately and wraps her in her arms.. kisses her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope my essay has done her justice. I love her with all my heart.
direction.name: direction
